result.reason: The current fix in SetRdpClientProperties uses _frmMain.Handle, which may be incorrect for detached windows or if initialized before parenting. Moving this to Connect() and using Control.FindForm() ensures the correct parent handle is used.
result.approach: Move the UIParentWindowHandle assignment from SetRdpClientProperties to Connect(), using Control.FindForm()?.Handle ?? _frmMain.Handle to correctly target the parent window.
